text:
Hello,
I've just updated my apache from 2.0.55 to 2.2.0, I'm using mod_ssl, I got
trouble  when starting my server, it requires to type my passphares at boot
time, if so, how can I start when remote it ?
Thank you for your help !

text:
This forum is for bug reports, not for user support.  Please see the appropriate
peer-to-peer user support mailing list.
